TidySimStat Edward J. Xu 2020-04-29 Chapter 1 Introduction This is the website hosting all the theories and and practices regarding stochastic simulation and statistics. It has the following features: R with Tidyverse package families is used to plot graphs and analyze results. Some detailed equations are included.
